audioText: Je garderai un souvenir merveilleux de ce camp de vacances, surtout des histoires racontées avant le coucher.
question: What will I keep a wonderful memory of from this vacation camp?
options: Especially the stories told before bedtime
Outdoor adventure activities and nature exploration programs
Friendship bonds formed with fellow campers during free time
Educational workshops and creative arts and crafts sessions
explanation: The text states 'Je garderai un souvenir merveilleux de ce camp de vacances, surtout des histoires racontées avant le coucher.' - I will keep a wonderful memory of this vacation camp, especially the stories told before bedtime. 'Camp' means camp, 'garderai' means will keep, and 'coucher' means bedtime.
source: Strategic noun coverage development - vacation camp bedtime stories
